publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3006 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Suspension of Standing Ordersâ€”That the Parliament agrees that Rule 12.3.3A of Standing Orders be suspended for the purpose of allowing the Justice 1 Committee to meet in the morning of Wednesday 29 June 2005. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
